column1: Hello, can I get please some diapers for size 5?
Peter bought a big bag of peppers from the market.
Victor's voice vibrated when he sang a favorite song.
Bobby parked his bike by the river and went fishing.
The brave firefighter saved a baby from the burning building.
The clever folks quickly found a way across the busy road.
The chef sprinkled pepper on the beef for extra flavor.
Omar is going to a dish party today.
Meet me at the bus station.
I love to eat Buffalo wings and pizza.
